label: Founder
summary: Founder and visionary behind Jerenyon Dev, delivering custom web development, automation, and AI-driven solutions.
description: Established Jerenyon Dev as a comprehensive web development and automation platform, showcasing technical expertise and innovative projects.
Developed and maintained full-stack web applications using Python, React, Next.js, and TypeScript.
Integrated AI capabilities and LLMs (OpenAI, Langchain) to enhance web and automation tools.
Designed a scalable backend infrastructure with seamless cloud deployments on Vercel and integration of modern services such as Resend for communication.
Managed all aspects of product development, including architecture, coding, testing, and client interaction.

label: TensorFlow Developer Specialization
summary: Completed TensorFlow Developer Professional Certificate, mastering neural network training, image recognition with convolutions, and NLP. Gained practical skills in building AI solutions using TensorFlow.

label: Deep Learning Specialization
summary: Completed Deep Learning Specialization, mastering neural networks, including CNNs, RNNs, LSTMs, and Transformers. Gained expertise in applying these models to real-world tasks like NLP, speech recognition, and more using Python and TensorFlow.

label: Machine Learning Specialization
summary: Completed Machine Learning Specialization, mastering key techniques like supervised and unsupervised learning, recommender systems, and reinforcement learning. Gained practical skills to apply these methods to real-world challenges.

label: Continuous Improvement Advisor | Lead Developer
summary: Driving innovation and operational efficiency through Python automation, AI adoption, advanced GIS integration, and scalable web development solutions.
description: Initially developed a Django-based platform, later transforming it into a robust, RESTful API using Django Rest Framework, facilitating seamless integration with a Next.js frontend.

Led the creation of a modern UI using Next.js, ensuring a responsive, user-centric experience, and deployed both Python backends and Next.js frontends independently using Docker for scalability and high performance on Azure.
Strategically implemented GIS technologies to enhance network design and civil engineering workflows, providing training and mentorship to empower the team.

Spearheaded R&D initiatives to integrate AI-driven solutions, developing custom automations with advanced models and frameworks like LangChain and OpenAI, enhancing tool capabilities and operational processes.

Developed and managed advanced Python automation scripts and tools, such as audit report generation from field surveys, aerial network pole and midspan calculations, and comprehensive geospatial data processing pipelines, improving data handling and analysis across departments.

Architected cloud-based infrastructure solutions on Azure, administering all resources including databases, web apps, container registries, GitHub repositories, and networking components, with automated CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployment.

Continually building new applications, employing Next.js for client-facing tools like a custom PDF report generator and data extraction utilities, while leveraging Python for backend-heavy data and geospatial processing.

label: Co-Founder
summary: Co-founder leading technical strategy and full-stack development for our creative e-commerce platform.
description: Spearheaded the strategic development and technical implementation of our custom e-commerce platform, transitioning from WordPress to a bespoke Django solution.
Oversaw full-stack development, implementing scalable web architectures with React and Next.js.
Managed and integrated advanced backend operations, ensuring seamless functionality and user experience.
Led cross-functional collaboration to align business goals with technical development, promoting innovation and growth.

label: Fiber Network Designer | Automation Engineer
summary: Enhanced fiber network design workflows through Python automation and GIS technology, leading to the development of a powerful Django-based platform.
description: Played a pivotal role in transforming manual CAD-based network design processes by integrating GIS tools and custom Python automation scripts, significantly reducing manual labor and human error.
Engineered a Django platform to streamline project management, data handling, and reporting workflows, boosting efficiency and accelerating project timelines.
Designed and implemented scalable database solutions using PostgreSQL and PostGIS to manage spatial data, automate complex geospatial processes, and support advanced analytics for network planning.
Developed Python-powered on-premises applications using PySide6 for GUI interfaces and PyInstaller for deployment, enhancing accessibility and usability for non-technical team members.
Introduced innovative AutoLISP tools to optimize AutoCAD and AutoCAD Map 3D functionalities, driving productivity improvements across engineering teams.
Collaborated effectively with multidisciplinary teams, facilitating knowledge transfer, mentoring, and fostering a culture of technological adoption and continuous improvement.

Pioneered GIS pilot projects that laid the foundation for future advancements in network design, enabling data-driven applications and automated solutions that supported the company's strategic goals.

label: Master of Science Geography
summary: Spatial analysis, environmental studies and coastal risks management. Hydrogeomorphology and climatology. Cartography and GIS modeling.

label: Bachelor's Degree Geography
summary: Fundamentals of geography, cartography, and GIS. Geomorphology, hydrology and climatology. Environmental hazards and risks management.
